example[0]: Her son Sean was born in 1983.
example[1]: They have three sons and a daughter.
example[2]: In those days, the property went to the eldest son.

definition[1]: used by an older person as a way to address a boy or young man
definition[2]: a man, especially a famous man, from a particular place or country
